channel.title: graphical issues
channel.description: [url='https://youtu.be/jhYQEgeTft0']Video[/url] I found graphical issues. It occurs after loadings. I did not observe before the update. I have to load a previous save to solve this problem.

item.title: graphical issues
item.dc:creator: Mezo
item.description:
I don’t use any mods, the game was not installed before the new update

item.title: graphical issues
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
This could be a mod related issue. Please unsubscribe from any mods you may have installed, verify your game cache, and see if that solves the problem.

item.title: graphical issues
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
Rayzen:

After update , I have a problem with Blast Bit chapter (freeze tentacles).

How to fix ?

First I would restart the chapter. Make a save before entering the map with the tentacles and if problem is still there, than check if the bug is not because some addon you are using.

Read full topic

item.title: graphical issues

item.description:
After update , I have a problem with Blast Bit chapter (freeze tentacles).

Read full topic

item.title: graphical issues
item.dc:creator: mutetus
item.description:
I was just wondering the same thing and came here to see if it’s a common problem, I have a similar weird pattern on my screen all the time right from the beginning as well and I definitely would’ve noticed them before the update.
My specs just in case: i7-950/12Gb/Radeon HD 7950 3Gb software version 16.3.2/Windows 10.

Edit: Got it away by adjusting shadow detail to low and then back to high, doesn’t seem to reappear again.

Read full topic
